server.cloudController

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.cloudController.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FedoraController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The base class for Deployment Controller (ssh into the given machine and execute the client program on the given machine) Currently we only implement the FedoraController. Using the external ganymed-ssh2 package
    Author:
    XySx
